TopicTitle: My game crashes when the loading bar finishes loading on start up

Articles.Content: Okay, so when i start up the game, i get the usual loading bar as it loads into the game and as soon as thats all done the game crashes, i dont even get to the Main Menu screen. What the hell is going on? i need help, i get a folder that pops up called "2014-08-27_132246" in side the folder is four files called "crash.dmp" "error" "output_log" "report" please help me fix this problem so i can finally play the new and improved Career Mode.

Hi wonderwaffle2k9, Welcome to the forum.

We need more information and to read the logs you have over there, please upload it to a share box.

And read this too,

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24543-NEED-SUPPORT-Read-this-before-posting-No-modded-installs

Regards

Its alright now, i fixed my problem with a bit of digging around in the files and found i had still had some mods installed even though i had uninstalled it and re-installed it 5 times, i got it working by running it with the launcher inside the KSP folder
